CustomField.formula:
IF(Bid_Number__c != "",
Bid_Number__c + BID_URL_Country__c + "?Title=" +
SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(
Account_Name__c + " - " + Stage_ID__c + " - " + Name, "&", "og"), " ", "%20"), "#", "-"), "Å", "A"), "å", "a"), "Ø", "O"), "ø", "o"), "Æ", "A"), "æ", "a"), "Ä", "A"), "ä", "a"), ",", " "),
"")
CustomField.label: Bid Room EmailLink
